title: Randomized, Prospective , Open Label, Phase 4 Trial of Efficacy and Safety of Adjunctive Cilostazol in Acute Myocardial Infarction Patients Undergoing Percutaneous Coronary Intervention With Drug-eluting Stent

operands.value: Acute Myocardial Infarction Undergoing Primary percutaneous coronary intervention
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
The patient has a known hypersensitivity or contraindication to any of the following medications: Heparin, Aspirin, Clopidogrel, Cilostazol
History of bleeding diathesis or known coagulopathy (including heparin-induced thrombocytopenia), or refuses blood transfusions.
Baseline hemogram with Hb<10g/dL or PLT count<100,000/μL
Patients already taking warfarin, cilostazol or any other type of anti-platelet agents except aspirin and clopidogrel
Gastrointestinal or genitourinary bleeding within the prior 3 months, or major surgery within 2 months

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Acute Myocardial Infarction Undergoing Primary percutaneous coronary intervention'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Not(Or(Symbol('Baseline hemogram with Hb<10g/dL or PLT count<100,000/μL'), Symbol('Gastrointestinal or genitourinary bleeding within the prior 3 months, or major surgery within 2 months'), Symbol('History of bleeding diathesis or known coagulopathy (including heparin-induced thrombocytopenia), or refuses blood transfusions.'), Symbol('Patients already taking warfarin, cilostazol or any other type of anti-platelet agents except aspirin and clopidogrel'), Symbol('Pregnancy'), Symbol('The patient has a known hypersensitivity or contraindication to any of the following medications: Heparin, Aspirin, Clopidogrel, Cilostazol'), Symbol('Uncontrolled hypertension'))))
